products.name: Women's adidas Originals Handball Spezial Casual Shoes
products.brandedName: adidas Women's Handball Spezial Casual Shoes
products.description: Sizing Information: Runs Large; consider selecting the next size down for your best fit. How to choose your size. Our sizing buttons list the Women's size first (W) and the equivalent Men's size second (M) Ex. If you usually wear a Men's size 10, select the button with W 11.0 / M 10.0. Product Features: Sleek adidas Originals low-top silhouette with archival style. Perforated leather or nubuck suede upper for premium throwback style. Lace-up closure across the vamp secures the fit. adidas Originals detailing at the tongue, midsole and 3-Stripes on each side for iconic adidas DNA. Inner textile lining for a smooth feel with added comfort. Durable rubber outsole for shock absorption that lasts wear after wear. The adidas Originals Handball Spezial Casual Shoes are imported. Update your everyday attire with the ultra-sleek Women's adidas Originals Handball Spezial Casual Shoes, a contemporary revamp of a 1979 classic. Designed for elite handball players in the '70s, these low-tops live on decades later as lifestyle staples off the court, effortlessly elevating any ensemble with its understated and super-clean good looks.

products.name: Women' UPF 50 Sweetheart Neckline Shirred One Piece Swimuit - Shape + Style™ by Aqua Green® Dark Teal Green 8
products.brandedName: Women' UPF 50 Sweetheart Neckline Shirred One Piece Swimuit - Shape + Style™ by Aqua Green® Dark Teal Green 8
products.unbrandedName: Women' UPF 50 Sweetheart Neckline Shirred One Piece Swimuit - Shape + Style™ by Aqua Green® Dark Teal Green 8
products.description: Soak up the sun in style with this UPF 50 Sweetheart-Neck Seamed One-Piece Swimsuit from Shape + Style™ by Aqua Green®. The sleeveless swimsuit is made of soft fabric with princess seams and shirred detailing down the front, a sweetheart neckline and molded cups for a flattering fit that will hug your body in all the right places. Designed in a bright pink front ending in blended pinks, a wine-colored bottom and a solid wine color across the back, the slimming swimsuit boasts a UPF rating of 50+ to let you enjoy the sun while staying comfortably shielded from harmful rays. Adjustable shoulder straps complete the design with a customizable fit.
